creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text: The alias directives in the tomcat-apache.conf file generated by tomcat are backslashes (windows file names) which apache doesn't like.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
This was fixed in Tomcat 3.2 and 3.3.  Won't be fixed in 3.1.
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
